name: Group Chats in ChatGPT
tagline: Collaborate with others & ChatGPT in the same conversation
description: Group chats are now in ChatGPT. You can add friends, family, or coworkers to a shared conversation to collaborate, plan, and create together with AI. It's separate from your private chats.

name: MyLens for Youtube
tagline: Turn Youtube videos into AI timelines
description: MyLens AI instantly turns any YouTube video into an interactive AI timeline of key moments. You can see all the key parts of long videos at a glance, click to only watch what matters most, and skip the noise. You can even expand sections or dive deeper into any parts with AI. It is a smarter way to watch and understand any YouTube content 10X faster.

name: Scraib.app
tagline: AI writing partner in every app on your Mac
description: Press ‚åÉR to instantly rewrite and improve any text. AI-powered writing assistant that lives in your menu bar.

name: Email Buttons
tagline: Turn email links into buttons that get clicked
description: Add buttons to Gmail emails easily. Create custom CTA buttons, save templates, add QR codes for Gmail. Perfect for marketing and sales.

name: SIMA 2
tagline: Google's most capable AI agent for virtual 3D worlds
description: An Agent that Plays, Reasons, and Learns With You in Virtual 3D Worlds. Powered by Gemini, it goes beyond following basic instructions to think, understand, and take actions in interactive environments ‚Äì meaning you can talk to it through text, voice, or even images.

name: SourcePIlot
tagline: Cursor for learning to write with confidence & precision
description: Own Your Writing Tool Forever. Enhance your writing experience with a personal editor that empowers you to write better, faster, and smarter. Begin your journey for free and upgrade wisely to unlock advanced features."

name: AirShare
tagline: AirDrop-style file local sharing and across the globe
description: Beautiful, private, lightning-fast file sharing across local networks and global peers. QUIC + Iroh. No accounts. No cloud.

name: WhereUAt
tagline: Know who‚Äôs actually on their way to your event.
description: Most event apps focus on tickets and big conferences. WhereUAt is for everyday meetups‚Äîsports, home parties, coffee catch-ups‚Äîwhere the real question is ‚ÄúAre they coming or should I keep waiting?‚Äù It shares live location only from 15 minutes before to 15 minutes after the event, then turns off automatically.

name: PaywallPro
tagline: Pinterest for App Paywall Designs
description: Trusted by 2,000+ apps, PaywallPro turns 46,000+ iOS paywalls into actionable insights. Track pricing, design shifts, revenue trends, and competitor strategies ‚Äî everything you need to grow smarter and monetize better.

name: Surfgeo
tagline: Where AI Search Discovers You
description: Drive traffic to your website from AI Search Surfgeo shows when and where you‚Äôre mentioned and recommended in AI answers, which sources models actually trust, and how your share of voice compares to competitors. It turns that visibility into a concrete GEO plan: prompt-level gaps, which domains to win on (blogs, reviews, communities), and content ideas tuned for how LLMs actually answer.

name: Laburen.com Agent Builder
tagline: Vibe-code custom-ready AI agents just by chatting
description: Build and deploy production-ready AI agents by just talking. Laburen Agents combines an intuitive vibe-code platform with expert support to bring real AI adoption to your company ‚Äî faster and easier than ever.

name: Audity
tagline: Run a 6-hour AI audit in 30 minutes
description: Audity turns messy client discovery into structured AI audits your clients trust. It guides interviews, analyzes workflows, and generates white-labeled ROI reports. With Audity‚Äôs system, agencies deliver clear, fast audits that close AI implementation deals.

name: Vaani, Conversational AI in InsurTech
tagline: Get the Insurance that gets you
description: Insurance shouldn‚Äôt feel like decoding legal paperwork. Meet Vaani, your personal AI voice insurance assistant, powered by Gemini and built to make understanding insurance as easy as having a conversation. Ask anything: ‚ÄúDo I need term insurance?‚Äù ‚ÄúHow much cover is right?‚Äù She listens, she explains clearly, and she guides you toward what suits you. We‚Äôre live on Product Hunt, come say hi.

name: SeedLegals LLC-to-C-corp converter
tagline: World's first automated LLC-to-C-corp conversion
description: Up to a third of start-ups that are planning to fundraise started out as an LLC, often incorporated in the state in which the founders are living. But when you raise investment, you have to be a C-corporation and typically a Delaware C-corporation. Welcome to the world's first beautifully productized LLC to C-Corp conversion. This is a game changer for every startup that is an LLC and wishes to now raise investment.

name: Monial
tagline: AI Social Listening Tool for B2B Teams and Product Marketers
description: Monial is a social listening tool for B2B SaaS and AI Companies

name: Kruiz
tagline: Travel with pets. Made simple.
description: Kruiz is the world‚Äôs first AI-powered pet travel app that makes traveling with your pet effortless. üêæ Find verified pet-friendly hotels, airline policies, and travel requirements‚Äîall in one place. Powered by Kruizy, your AI travel assistant, Kruiz personalizes every trip through smart pet profiles and seamless pet-friendly booking. No more guessing, hidden fees, or phone calls - just clarity, confidence, and stress-free travel. ‚úàÔ∏è

name: Ads Lab (beta)
tagline: 1-click AI video ads from your app or website
description: AdsLab.one (beta) turns any mobile app or website URL into ready-to-test video ads. Paste the link, click once, and get high-performing concepts for Meta, TikTok, and YouTube.

name: Learn By Podcas
tagline: Turn text and ideas into quick, shareable audio for learning
description: Learn By Podcas turns everyday moments into opportunities to learn, discover, and share through audio. Turn commutes, workouts, or walks into hands-free learning with quick, engaging sessions. Explore diverse perspectives on news, get the essence of long reads in short audio bites, and share insights with friends. Browse our growing library of topics and join our early access community ‚Äî free to use and evolving fast!

name: Feed Clips
tagline: Music API with licensed popular song clips for apps
description: Feed Clips lets apps add real, major-label music clips to short-form content, fully licensed, curated, and easy to integrate. It‚Äôs a music API built for apps and platforms that want to launch music clip features quickly and legally.

name: Word Hack
tagline: Enter the terminal. Engage your mind. Exploit the language.
description: A retro terminal-style word-strategy roguelite where every valid word you spell becomes an exploit. Assemble letter cards, upgrade firmware and scripts, breach adaptive firewalls and face boss challenges‚Äîall while mastering vocabulary in a cyberpunk deck-builder.
